block.p: Coach PHIL JACKSON of the Chicago Bulls has clinched the head coaching job for the Eastern Conference All-Star team more than a week before the cutoff date for determining the post. The Bulls have a six-and-a-half-game lead over Cleveland in the race for the best record in the conference, too large a margin for the Cavaliers to make up by Jan. 26. The coaches of the teams with the best records in each conference after games of that date will be the head coaches for the All-Star Game at Orlando, Fla., on Feb. 9. (AP)

Coach PHIL JACKSON of the Chicago Bulls has clinched the head coaching job for the Eastern Conference All-Star team more than a week before the cutoff date for determining the post. The Bulls have a six-and-a-half-game lead over Cleveland in the race for the best record in the conference, too large a margin for the Cavaliers to make up by Jan. 26. The coaches of the teams with the best records in each conference after games of that date will be the head coaches for the All-Star Game at Orlando, Fla., on Feb. 9. (AP) SPORTS PEOPLE: BASKETBALL
